title: 16" Black Round Flat Catering Serving Party Tray Food Platter + Clear Dome Lid (Pack of 10 Sets)
features: Premium Quality 16" round black plastic catering food trays with matching clear plastic dome lids. Pack of 10 Sets (10 Trays with 10 Lids)
Trays are made with heavy duty thermoformed rigid plastic, do not easily bend or break. Clear dome lids snap on, allowing for easy food transport and upscale food presentation.
Trays are intended for one-time single use, however they are very sturdy. Trays are dishwasher safe and can be reused.
OU Kosher Certified, 100% food grade safe. Widely used by restaurants and caterers across America.
Proudly Made in the USA with American sourced materials.
description: HEAVY DUTY FLAT 16" BLACK PLASTIC CATERING / SERVING TRAYW/DOME LIDS (DOME LID DESIGN PATTERN MAY DIFFER THAN PICTURED) (pack of 10)PRODUCT FEATURES: 16" inches diameter round flat black trays w/ clear dome lids. 10 sets heavy duty trays, Intended for single use but can be washed and re-used. Matching clear dome lids included (pattern on dome lid may differ) excellent for parties, catering events, food presentation. Used by many high-end restaurants and caterers across America. Proudly made in the USA with American sourced materials.
